mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training( memberCode, trainingPeriod, trainingStart, trainingEnd, trainingNation, trainingDetail, trainingDate) VALUES ( #{memberCode}, #{trainingPeriod}, #{trainingStart}, #{trainingEnd}, #{trainingNation}, #{trainingDetail}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT memberId, memberName, trainingPeriod, trainingStart, trainingEnd, trainingNation, trainingDetail, trainingDate from training join member on training.memberCode = member.memberCode

SELECT memberId, memberName,trainingCode, trainingNation,trainingStart,trainingEnd,trainingPeriod,trainingDetail from training join member on training.memberCode = member.memberCode where memberId = #{memberId}
